group_1.narration: The Magical Girl “Misa,”@who entrusted something to Punbert...
All traces of her had@vanished from the memory of her@best friend, Etsuko.
“We searched for the@‘Voice Between the Waves” together...”

group_1.textRight: I remember what sort of process we went@through.
We discovered a theory about the “Legend@of the Paper Mulberry Leaf.”
The voice the two in that story heard was@believed to be the Voice Between the Waves.
The first thing we did was visit the@shrine that honors the two of them.

group_1.textLeft: You thought it through a lot more@than we did...

group_1.textRight: Perhaps.[chara:801400:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:801400:cheek_0][chara:801400:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:801400:lipSynch_1]@But we didn’t hear anything.

group_1.narration: “We discussed it.@'...Is it because of the direction of the wind?'@'But there are people who heard it@in a completely different place...'”
“It's called the 'Voice Between the Waves,’@so it must be coming from across the sea...”
“Thus, we decided to take an@inflatable raft out to sea.”

group_1.textLeft: ...No way, just the two of you?

group_1.textRight: Yes, we went to a small island off the@coast and back.

group_1.textLeft: ...It sounds like the two of you were@quite the tomboys.
We gave up at the lighthouse and@headed back...

group_1.textRight: It’s dangerous, so don’t imitate us,@alright?
You could get swept away and never@come back.

group_1.textLeft: True...

group_1.textRight: Back then, we weren’t afraid of anything.
The future seemed so bright and shining.

group_1.textLeft: The future...

group_1.textRight: Yes, we used to talk about it a lot.

group_1.narration: “Decades from now...@I wonder where we’ll be and@what we’ll be doing.”

group_1.textRight: And yet...
Why can’t I remember her name or face...?
She was my best friend...@We were always together...

group_1.textLeft: ...I see.
There’s certainly something unnatural@about her memories...

group_1.textRight: Etsuko remembers going to the island@with “someone.”
She can recall it vividly.
But she has no idea who she went with...
She hadn’t even thought about the event@until today...

group_1.textLeft: After they went to that island... Were they able to@hear the Voice Between the Waves in the end?

group_1.textRight: No... She couldn’t remember that part.

group_1.textLeft: ...Eh? It’s odd that's the only part@she can't remember.
Did somethin’ happen with Misa?
It’s still unknown how Punbert,@which belonged to Misa,
came to reside in the villa...
It would seem...
...only the memories of Misa are@missing...?
Are ya playin’ possum? You can move now,@can’tcha?
There’s only Magical Girls ‘round here.
Even in front of Etsuko, you pretended@to be a toy.
There’s a whole lotta mystery here...
But I guess this piece ‘o junk is the key.
Could the lost memories of Miss Etsuko@and Miss Misa be restored
by going to that island?
Is that a yes?

group_1.textRight: I guess so...
Punbert and I walked all over the place@yesterday.
I think it wants to go to the other side@of the sea.

group_1.textLeft: Rather than the “Voice Between the Waves”@itself,
it’s looking for places containing@memories of the both of them?
Sounds likely.

group_1.textRight: ...Actually, that's why I came to see@Livia today.
You’re a Coordinator, right?
You can change a Magical Girl’s form,@can’t you?

group_1.textLeft: Didn’t realize Mitama did that sorta@thing too...

group_1.textRight: But...why are you bringing this up all@of a sudden...?

group_1.textLeft: *Chuckle*... I getcha.@Ya wanna cross the ocean?

group_1.textRight: That's right.

group_1.textLeft: Ya want me to adjust yer transformation...
...so ya can move freely in the sea@with Punbert, yeah?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, it’d be difficult to get a boat@out there...

group_1.textLeft: Indeed, I would be at a loss to explain@what it’s for if pressed.

group_1.textRight: I can't do any useful magic in this form@at sea.
Like being able to breathe underwater,@or parting the sea in half...
Please make some kind of version suitable@for the sea!

group_1.textLeft: It would be better if it looks like a@swimsuit as well,
so that others won't be suspicious of you@even when you're transformed.

group_1.textRight: ...How about it,@can you do it?

group_1.textLeft: As long as yer willin’ ta pay for it,@it's no problem.
Can’t put my reputation as Mitama’s@mentor to shame.
Ah, ya got payment in the form of Grief@Seeds, right?

group_1.textRight: Yup!@It’s what I came here for.

group_1.textLeft: It seems you’re awake.

group_1.textRight: Woah, she’s here?!

group_1.textLeft: She just waltzed in, said she was sleepy,@‘n crashed.

group_1.textRight: Her vibe seems different from before...?
I'm sorry...at this hour...@I'm still...sleepy...

group_1.textLeft: Did she fall asleep?!

group_1.textRight: …![wait:1.0][chara:305901:eyeClose_0][chara:305901:motion_400][chara:305901:cheek_1][chara:305901:face_mtn_ex_050.exp.json][chara:305901:lipSynch_1]@I’m...not asleep, see?

group_1.textLeft: Ah…

group_1.textCenter: On the way to the station, she saw a sleepy-looking@ghost, so she told me to be careful...
